overview: Leila Smith, Julia Roca (making her long-awaited VT debut) and Talia Mint are hanging out, enjoying beer and snacks, when they decide to play a game of Truth or Dare. The questions are racy, Ukrainian beauty Talia switching effortlessly between English and Spanish to translate. When Leila is too embarrassed to answer a question, the others blindfold her and challenge her to strip. Julia kisses and touches her seductively, and then leads her to the bedroom...
title: Truth or Dare
